item.title: One Year Anniversary
item.description: Hi, It’s been an exact year since the first post on this blog! Time really goes by, I had plans to update this blog but got busy apparently. A lot has happened in this year, I got a new job, in a new city! I’m not one for traveling often, so I always appreciate a change of scenery :) I also got really interested in quantum physics and string theory, I like the idea of a single equation to explain the universe.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, My name is Omar and I look like this I got my undergraduate degree in Computer Science from Boston University. I’ll soon update this page with more details about the kind of research that I worked on while at BU. Stay tuned!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is the first post, just trying this out, hopefully I write more stuff, stay tuned!
